_sText:
Hello there! 
this is my very first almost completed map and my third uploaded mod content ( have uploaded 2 maps to steam workshop with portal 2 in-game map builder )

I just decompiled the official version of de_train and did some changes:
    the entrance of T's to the A site
    the structure of ivy
    the location of bomb site A
    the closed gate of lane 1 of A site
    the structure of the ladder or pop dog
    the structure of B halls and upper B ( the location being blocked by a big house )
    or more locations that I don'tremember
I am a begginner and the map builing skill of mine is poor. maybe there is a lot of disadvantages so please leave a comment about that and I will fix it as possible as i can. enjoy :)
